availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elijah R. Eskridge (Breckinridge County cabinet maker)

body.p: Breckinridge County, cabinet maker. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth M. Eskridge. Father of James G. Eskridge, M. Eskridge, Mariam Eskridge, Roscoe Eskridge, Alfred Eskridge, Jennie Eskridge, and Melville Eskridge.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 1, p. 114. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, District 1. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Hardinsburg, p. 23. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Hardinsburg, p. 478. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Hardinsburg, p. 1.
